original_title: The Hunters and the Hunted: The Making of 'Predator 2'
overview: The Hunters and the Hunted: The Making of Predator 2 is a 2005 documentary that details the production of the 1990 film Predator 2. Created for the Predator 2: Special Edition DVD set, it uses interviews with the film's cast and crew, as well as behind the scenes footage and imagery, to examine the development, filming and release of the movie.
title: The Hunters and the Hunted: The Making of 'Predator 2'
